name: Tag Runner
description:
Tag Runner is a platformer game that allows you to play with your friends with addicting gameplay and full of features !

Current Version : v1.0.0

Features : 

- In game guide
- Realtime multiplayer game
- Live chat in a room
- Full control room
- Easy matchmaking with random players
- Scoring system
- 4 different powerups
- 2 playable characters
- 4 max player
- Cool effects
- Epic music & sound effects

and many more !

Control Manual : 
- Jump above the crate to destroy and get the power ups 
- Press down to fall through platforms
- Press jump to make your character jumps, hold longer to jump higher. (Jump will causing effect that able to show your location)
- Toggle run to set your character walking or running, make sure you have enough stamina (Run will causing effect that able to show your location)
- Idle / stay to regenerate your stamina faster, walk will regenerate but slow
- Press power up if you have any

 Game manual : 
- You can only play after there are 2 players in a room
- Create rules to end the game (i.e whoever gets 1000 score, won the game)
- Go through left or right edge to make your character appear from other side
- Crates will respawn every 10 seconds after getting destroyed
- As Enemy, you don't get score every second, but you can get 5 score by tagging other players, so just find other players or trap them.
- As Player, you will get 1 score every second, but you cannot tag other players, so just run or wait.
- After getting tagged by enemy, you need to wait for 7 seconds to respawn as enemy (You cannot leave game while respawning)

Note : 
- Currently only 20 max players active in game only, cannot excced higher (if the game crowded, we will try to buy server, so you can help us by donate)
- Currently we are using Asia (based in Singapore) server, which means if you are from Europe or others, you may facing connection issues, so make sure to play with friends in same locations to avoid issues
